title: Can You Be Independent In a Relationship
itunes:title: Can You Be Independent In a Relationship
description:
On today's show, a discussion formed after Michelle Obama's Essence Fest speech touched on having a life partner being your teammate, so we opened up the phone lines to find out if you can be independent in a relationship. Moreover, Charlamagne awarded Michael Paul Adams with Donkey of the Day and Master P stopped by to discuss his new self funded film, "I Got the Hook Up 2" and what it's like working with his son, Romeo.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
